title: The Ukrainian Revolution (1917-1921)
description: This period covers the key events of the Ukrainian Revolution, starting with the February Revolution of 1917 and ending with the struggle for statehood in 1921.

title: Western Ukrainian People's Republic (1918-1919)
description: This period is devoted to the history of the Western Ukrainian People's Republic, its struggle for independence and integration with the Ukrainian People's Republic.

title: The Second World War
description: The bloodiest war in the history of mankind, which lasted from 1939 to 1945 and covered most countries of the world.

title: The First World War
description: The war, which lasted from 1914 to 1918, was one of the largest and most destructive conflicts in human history.
